attributes.action: Use the normal media such as the BBC and Sky News to make it well known that this site exists and that the public can use this site to exercise its rights of petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is only because I stumbled upon this site that I know it exists and I don’t think the government has made it well known to the public They can climb it exists but its only useful if we all know it is here. There needs to be more publicity around this facility.
